text: Erik Hric (born 24 September 1997) is a Slovak footballer who currently plays for Prameň Kováčová as midfielder. ==Club career== ===Dukla Banská Bystrica=== Hric made his Fortuna Liga debut for Dukla Banská Bystrica on 6 March 2015 against Spartak Trnava.DUKLA VS. title: Erik Hric
